name: js/components/box/index.js

unknown.tagValue:
Box is the class that contains the methods for all actions a Box
should be able to perform. It takes care of orchestring the chain of
events.

name: constructor
description: Constructor for the Light class

params.name: board
params.description:
this is the board class delivered
by johnny five for one board. In this case we talk about a photon board

params.name: client
params.description:
This is an  instance of an mqtt client that
will be used to communicate with oder boxes

params.name: options
params.description: Option containing next, prev and isMaster

name: board
description: A Johnny Five Board instance

name: client
description: An Mqtt client

name: options
description: Option with next, prev and isMaster

name: name
description: The Box's name

name: round
description: The round actually playing

name: translator
description:
The Translator component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: light
description:
The Light component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: motor
description:
The Motor component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: speaker
description:
The Speak component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: infrared
description:
The Infra component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: microphone
description:
The Micro component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: onConnect
description: Is called when the Box's mqtt client is ready and connected.

name: onMessage
description: Is called when a mqtt message is received

params.name: topic
params.description: the mqtt topic the message was sent on

name: sendMessage
description: Send a message to wether the nex or the previous Box via mqtt

params.name: message
params.description: message to be sent to the sibling Box

name: onBoardReady
description: Is called when the Photon board is ready

name: getClient
description: Retruns the Box's mqtt client

name: getBoard
description: Returns the Box's j5 board

name: start
description: Internal start, starts detecting

name: startTheShow
description: External start, intreases the round

name: restartTheShow
description: Restarts the complete show and resets the round

name: onPresenceDetected
description: Is called when the infrared detects a presence

name: onRulesExplained
description: Is called when the Box has spoken the rules out loud

name: prepareToSpeak
description: Is called when the Box is meant to speak

name: speakText
description: Speaks the text out loud

name: onRecordingFailed
description:
Is called when the voice was badly recorded, when no sound was identified
or when the speech could not be transformed into text

name: onTextSpoken
description: Is called whe the box has successfully spoken the text out loud

name: finish
description: Ends the show of the box

name: onPreviousBoxSpeaking
description: Is called when the previous box is speaking the text out loud

name: isLastRound
description: Is called to check is this is the last round

name: js/components/infrared/index.js
constructor
description:
Constructor for the Infrared class. Needs a j5 board instance
to work well. !CAUTION¡ The j5 board must already be ready.

name: board
description: Johnny Five Board instance

name: proximity
description: Johnny Five Proximity instance

name: distance
description: Actual detected distance in cm

name: presenceDetected
description: Wether or not a human presence is detected

name: resolve
description:
The Function to resolve in case a long presence
has been detected

name: throttledCheck
description:
A throttled function checking if a human presence
is still detected after a certain time

name: onData
description:
Is called when the infrared detects a distance. In other words,
all the time.

return.description:
Return a valid Johnny Five
instance of the Proximity class. See http://johnny-five.io/api/proximity/
for mor details.

name: detectPresence
description:
Is called to start the infrared detection. Overrides the global
resolve function with the Promise.resolve function.

name: checkLaterIfStillPresent
description:
Checks if a presence is detected and resovles the Promise
if so. Resets the promise to its default.

name: js/components/light/index.js
constructor
description:
Constructor for the Light class. Needs a j5 board instance
to work well. !CAUTION¡ The j5 board must already be ready.

name: led
description: The led light of the class (for now just one)

name: startBlinking
description: Is called to make the lights blink

name: stopBlinking
description: Is called to make the lights stop blinking

name: js/components/microphone/index.js
reportAudio
description: Writes a report file for the audi recoring

name: getAudioData
description: Retrieves the relevant audio report

name: startRecording
description: Start recording

name: js/components/microphone/utils/records/index.js
constructor
description: Records and writes the audio in a wav file

name: js/components/microphone/utils/reports/index.js
data
description: Audio data

name: filePath
description: Complete file path

name: newObject
description: New audio report config

name: writeJSON
description: Writes an audio report in a json file

name: extendJSON
description: Extends the audio report in an existing json file

name: js/components/motor/index.js
constructor
description:
Constructor for the Motor class. Needs a j5 board instance
to work well. !CAUTION¡ The j5 board must already be ready.

name: liftServo
description: The servo meant to lift the box up and down

name: tiltServo
description: The servo meant to make the box look up and straight

name: stands
description: Is the Box standing up?

name: titls
description: Is the Box looking up?

name: moveServo
description:
Generic function that checks if a servo is already in the
whished position and rotates it if not.

params.name: positionToMoveTo
params.description: The rotation the servo need to accomplish

name: lieDown
description: Lifts the Box down

name: standUp
description: Lifts the Box up

name: lookUp
description: Makes the Box look up

name: lookStraight
description: Makes the Box look down

name: js/components/speaker/index.js
speakText
description:
Makes the Box speech its text out loud.
NOT IMPLEMENTED YET

name: sayNoRecordingError
description:
Makes the Box excusing itself for not having
understood the user and ask to repeat.
NOT IMPLEMENTED YET

name: explainRules
description:
Makes the Box explain the rules of the game.
NOT IMPLEMENTED YET

name: js/components/translator/index.js

unknown.tagValue: Translator class for managing different Box languages

name: translateText
description:
Translated the initial input in four languages
NOT IMPLEMENTED YET

name: js/constants/index.js
INFRARED_CONSTANTS
description:
All hardcoded values and constants
for the infrared class

name: LIGHT_CONSTANTS
description:
All hardcoded values and constants
for the light class

name: MOTOR_CONSTANTS
description:
All hardcoded values and constants
for the motor class

name: js/index.js

unknown.tagValue: Represents the whole chain of Boxes

name: constructor
description:
Initializes boards, mqqtt clients and starts the masterBox
automatically. Is not meant to be imported.

name: boxes
description: Collection of Boxes taking part to the show

name: masterBox
description: The first box to start the show, the one recoring

name: onAllBoardsReady
description:
Is called when all Johnny Five boards are ready.
Starts the event chain by calling start the show
on the master Box.

name: chain
description:
Automatically starts the chain by creating a new instance
of the BoardChain class

name: js/utils/boardsUtil.js

unknown.tagValue: Utility for handling Johnny Five boards

name: createBoard
description:
Returns a config for a Johnny Five board with an id and a Particle
Photon board

params.name: id
params.description: Any name you want to assign to your Photon board

params.name: deviceId
params.description: The Particle.io deviceId of you photon

name: js/utils/clientsUtil.js
createClient
description: Creates and returns a mqtt client with the give name

params.name: name
params.description: The same name as your Johnny Five board instance

return.description: An Mqqt client connected via shiftr.io

name: js/utils/logUtil.js
PREFIX_TABULATION
description:
Prefix intended to add a line break an tabulations in the
log messages to align them to the title
!CAUTION¡ Do not refactor because it look bad. It is intended
to be so !CAUTION¡

name: getFormattedTime
description:
Retrieves a formatted date like node does. Wraps the square
Brackets in a whote color with chalk to imitate the color
hilighting of oh-my-zsh

name: getColorByType
description: Maps logging types to colors for log hilighting

params.name: type
params.description: Wether info, hardware, shiftr, error, warning or discrete

return.description: The color associated to the type

name: doLog
description:
Parses an obtion object and logs whatever is gived to him in the
relevant color.

name: log
description: Log a formatted and hilighted message to the console

params.name: messageOrOptions
params.description:
Wether a sing sting
												 or an object containing
												 title, type and/or messages
